TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Discover What Our Users Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from product enthusiasts who've found their next favorite item
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has completely transformed how I discover new products. It's like having a personal shopper in my pocket!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've found so many unique items I never knew existed. It's addictive and fun to use!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a small business owner, this app has helped me stay on top of market trends. It's an invaluable tool!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore a world of innovative items tailored to your interests
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us what you're looking for, and we'll help you find amazing new products!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Any Specific Features You're Looking For?
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: AI-powered device for seamless home automation
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Insulated, BPA-free bottle with built-in filter
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Lightweight, foldable solar panel for on-the-go charging
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Advanced health monitoring with sleek design
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: HD camera drone with easy controls for beginners
CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new products tailored just for you. Our app uses advanced algorithms to curate a personalized selection of items you'll love.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to suggest new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply input your likes and dislikes, and we'll curate a personalized selection of items for you to explore.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are the products on the app available for purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! Most products featured on our app are available for purchase. We provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can buy the items that catch your eye. Some products may be concepts or prototypes, which will be clearly labeled.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have fresh and exciting items to discover. Our team of curators works tirelessly to bring you the latest innovations and trending products across various categories.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I save or share products I like?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! You can save your favorite products to your personal wishlist for easy access later. You can also share interesting finds with friends and family via social media or direct messaging, making it easy to spread the excitement of your discoveries.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
HERO_SUBTITLE: Explore, Compare, and Be the First to Know About Cutting-Edge Releases
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Find answers to common questions about our product discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app help me find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to suggest unique and exciting products tailored to your interests. We analyze trends, reviews, and your browsing history to provide personalized recommendations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our basic version is completely free to use. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for those who want an enhanced product discovery experience.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't handle transactions directly, our app provides links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the products you discover. We ensure a seamless transition from discovery to purchase.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items. Our team constantly scouts for new and exciting products to add to our platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share product discoveries with friends?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app has built-in sharing features that allow you to easily share your favorite product discoveries with friends and family via social media or direct messaging.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find the Best New Items on the Market
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Receive tailored product suggestions based on your preferences, browsing history, and shopping patterns.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with authentic user feedback and ratings for each product.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals by comparing prices from multiple retailers and online marketplaces.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Create wishlists of products you love and easily share them with friends and family.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get notified instantly when new products matching your interests become available.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the Next Big Thing - Join Our Product Discovery Community!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Uncover Innovative Products Before They Go Mainstream
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Your gateway to the latest and greatest in consumer goods. Stay ahead of trends, find unique items, and be the first to know about game-changing products across all categories.
